title: Karma's stripped of even more mechanics. RITO pl0x
body:
Does anyone even pl0x anymore? haha XD

With the recent patch notes, you wont be able to shield minions any longer. 
But can we STILLLL please target them?
like what {{champion:117}}  does with pix?

Shielding a minion to deny the enemy gold is frustrating and toxic for the enemy. Totally. And i felt like old gp when i saw the enemy miss cs cuz of me.
But shielding a minion with karma is also used in other ways, like for the utility.

She would be able to aoe shield while rushing to allies by clicking on any minions in the allies range. 
It was also used to speed up the front minion to tank tower aggro faster and start taking the tower down.

I get it, sometimes karma players accidentally shield a minion when meaning to target ally. 
What about making champions hitboxes larger for allies?? 
Whats next? {{champion:40}} wont be able to cast shield on tower because she cant target her ally next to it?? (dear god so help me if that happens)
The way to get around this is to press e as you were to cast and click the allies portrait above the minimap. (RITO plz let us move the portraits around)


These are integral parts of Karma, and taking this away really messes with some karma players. 

This is what little Uniqueness she had left, after all the mechanic changes/removals she has had in the past. 


Speaking of Karma, when will she be able to attack with her fans again?

and they're basically removing the one thing thats unique about her..

I'm pretty sure the reason people want to keep it is because of her Mantra shield radius being based off of the target you cast it on.

Meaning, if an ally is about to die and they're just out of reach, you can target a minion with Mantra shield in order to close the gap (because the minion is closer to your ally)

Yeah, no. Its never a good idea to let a non-aoe shield/heal target minions. 

1) Its annoying to face against as an enemy, especially when behind, especially against an aggressive support who is already going to be pushing you out of lane anyway. You need to be able to have a safe option to CS.

2) Losing lane because you shielded a minion instead of your ADC will always be bad. Its the same reason they removed ignite from being able to be used on minions/monsters; sure, you could argue some random stars align situation where it would be optimal, but more often than not it would literally cost you the game by causing an accidental use unintended.

My guessing as to why Lulu is an exception is because her spell has an offensive version that targets minions, as well as changes the angle of her Q. Theres legitimate use for it beyond straight denial. Likewise, janna shield on towers isnt comparable either; only 3 towers per lane and theyre fairly large hitboxes that you often arent standing right ontop of, so you arent likely to "accidentally" shield tower over your adc, while you are extremely likely to shield a minion over adc by accident depending on matchup (enemy blitz/thresh/morg where you want to be essentially in your own minion wave if youre not zoned out).
keep in mind that this is karma's ultimate.

Said this in a previous thread, but here we go again.

In 6.9, Riot made several changes to mid lane champions to reduce the amount of wave clear in the game. Because of this, along with Zed's massive drop in play rate, you cannot expect pro players to kill every minion out of a wave instantly, and that's what Riot wants.

However, because you can't instantly wave clear, the counterplay to Karma's Defiance disappears. Currently, the ability can't be used if the enemy team is using long range AOE abilities to prevent you from bunching up. The enemy team should be rewarded for doing this against Karma. But if she can target minions they don't NEED to be bunched up to go in.

These nerfs were targeted at pro play Karma specifically to reduce her play rate before World's. The ability to shield your entire team with a minion reduces counterplay against the ability, and is not healthy at the pro level.

Then they probably should be honest enough to write that in the patch notes.

I value your input and admire your insight, but if this is true it just speaks volumes about the desire Riot has to talk to the Karma community. Which is none.

Okay, calm down. You don't need to get into conspiratorial nonsense. You're a passionate Karma player and I can understand that, but Meddler has already responded to Karma players directly, saying that he wants her to get some attention but she's low priority. It's not like you've had radio silence this season.
No. We got an overpowered buff to her mantra shield, then a nerf to her shield, and then the removal of minion shielding. How did any of this address Karma's issues? It didn't.

The inability of Karma support to max Q and still have a full powered AOE speed buff on Defiance is important for pro Karma. Now if someone wants to support Karma, they need to max E first and lose a lot of kill pressure, or max Q first and lose a lot of mobility, which is why you pick Karma support. It's a nerf to her damage in the early game overall.

That sounds more stupid the more I read it. Or incoherent.
Even though you, once again, argued brilliantly.
I am really sorry, I've become increasingly un-calm over the past few months. 

First the mage-update, that focused on clarifying identity to (immobile) mages adressed (not-so-immobile) Kennen, Ziggs and Viktor, but not Karma. Okay, fine. She is a support, or whatever. Then the comment about how Karma could use the work, but working on groups is more efficient.... well okay, I get it. And then the information about how they might do her in an Enchanter Update or an Ionian Event, when they just did a touchup on half the enchanters, excluding her, in the last few months. Well then an Enchanter Update isn't needed for the next 1-2 years. 

And now this cut to her already lacking uniqueness&depth and push to her increasing blandness aqnd dumbing down of her choices is just icing on the cake made of dogpoo.

My only saving grace is the thought that they might be planning on the Ionian Event already, because {{champion:84}} {{champion:98}} {{champion:11}} {{champion:39}} {{champion:43}} could profit greatly from some thematic touchups. And that they are silent because they wanna surprise us. Or sth.

Alright, just for you, I'll whip up a Karma rework in the Champion Concepts section addressing the themes I think are relevant to her. If you like it, maybe you can help the other Karma players get over there and draw attention to it.

I like reading through Karma reworks. They are either better than mine or will make my next one better. Sometimes both. 

I am not a leader, I will not rally people. But if you want thoughts, criticism, suggestions, instight, I will always be there.
Here you go http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/skin-champion-concepts/drEnk2g7-champion-rework-karma-the-enlightened-one

Did that buff to her mass shield address her problems though? Did it give Karma a real niche and address her identity problems? No. It was an excuse on Riot's behalf to say they worked on Karma, but not really work on Karma.

Cause they only have to do it for one patch cycle. 

But the funny part is what happens afterward. Pretty much after MSI and after Worlds, riot goes like "Horay, Pro's are on heiatus, now we can make all the changes we wanted to, ADC's get an udpate, and Mages get an update, and Dragon gets and update, EVERYONE GETS UPDATES."

And then were are all like "whoo, wait, what? What happened to the League we knew and loved?"

Aaand that would be absolutely fine if it wasn't for everything else they've done to her since her rework. The fact that something as seemingly insignificant and simple as shielding a minion can have people feel this way, says a lot.

I agree with you, but we were all told several times that 6.15-6.18 is solely concerned with World's. They will probably get around to throwing Karma a bone sometime this year, but as Meddler said quite plainly, "she's not struggling gameplay-wise, so her uniqueness isn't a priority".

Yeah that's fair enough, and I agree Meddler has been quite clear with that. The problem is the Live Balance team butchering her mantra, and this idea of waiting for either an Enchanter update which is at least 2 years off, or an Ionian event that may never happen. It's the whole attitude of "let's fuck her up now then sort it out later", and they can just do that because she's not oh so precious Lee Sin. 

Karma fans remain salty because they see mages getting updated without Karma... cool. Then we see a bunch of supports and support items getting updates/power shifts and still nothing for Karma, even though we've been asking for at least a power shift to bring her back in line with her original direction... but no. 

If they choose to ignore her again in the preseason (which I'm sure they will), then that would be message received loud and so very clear. They don't care.

Karma functions very well with the new items. New Talisman, Athene's, Ardent and Mikael's make her AOE shield an immense shield/heal combo that also gives speed, and you combine that with Talisman to go in like crazy. She benefits from the item changes, she doesn't need tweaks to her kit.

My concern regarding her gameplay is that she's been dumbed down so much, not because she isn't strong or doesn't work well with items. Karma's identity has always been in her mantra, that was what defined her and it's now been turned into just another basic "enhance next ability" button with nothing to distinguish it. That was a problem when her rework was released and has become even more of a problem since 5.10, it drastically reduced her skill cap and made her even more of a generic generalist. Minion shielding was literally the very last nuance left in her kit.

It made her more powerful,
it didn't give her identity or depth.

Karma has always seemed stupid to me. Her q is stupidly strong for having so much utility and she even heals up for 20% of her missing hp, so if you were thinking about winning a trade vs her, think again. As soon as she gets ahead by anything one q can chunk half your hp, and the root is just to make sure you can get hit by another deadly q.

Of course she has strong abilities, she is a champion that has no ultimate!

Or alternatively, if you prefer:
Of course she can heal 20% missing hp, that is her ultimate!
A 40 second cooldown ultimate that can be reduced to be really 20ish seconds with her passive?
that makes her spells almost as good as any other champs ultimate! Kappa

Yeah.  Champions with relatively weaker ultimates get lower cooldowns.  There's plenty of champions that don't have standards ults and low cooldowns.

And what if I told you there  was a champion with a _full-fledged_ ultimate that has 25-15 seconds cooldown that can be reduced to 0 seconds, reset, with an ability?

Her teamwide engage was nerfed, deserved really. She can't shield minions and? It's a frustrating tachtic that no one likes to play against, and honestly barely anyone did it. Her winrate fell by 1% and it's only been 1 day, it's not the end of the world.

She's been butchered since the first day of her redesign. Anything they do to her now that maintains the current design is always going to be terrible.
